Name: Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB RAM)
Description: Main controller, provides processing for AprilTag detection.

Name: SanDisk Extreme 32GB microSD Card (A2 rated)
Description: High-speed storage for OS and AprilTag data.

Name: OV5640 USB Camera Module
Description: Affordable 5MP USB camera for overhead tracking.

Name: Powered USB 3.0 Hub (7-port)
Description: Provides stable power and data for camera and robot charging.

Name: EVA Foam Interlocking Floor Mats (24 sq ft, e.g., 6 tiles)
Foam Pipe Insulation (2m length, 10cm diameter)
Description: Soft, 10cm high borders for the arena (can be cut/glued).

Name: PVC Pipe (1-inch Schedule 40, 10ft)
Description: For camera mount structure and optional arena frame.

Name: PVC Fittings (T-connectors, Elbows, Caps)
Description: To assemble the PVC camera mount and frame.

Name: USB A to Micro USB / USB C Cables (for robot charging)
Construction Adhesive (e.g., Liquid Nails)
Description: For securing foam borders to the arena frame.

Name: Black Spray Paint (for borders)
Description: Optional: to color foam borders black as per sumo rules.
